I don't agree with a restart.  I agree with the faction peice and was 
also thinking that over.  We are to spread out and have to limit 
ourselves.  I think that a sequal would be better, it's almost a 
restart but players can carry some stuff over, i just think we should 
have at the most four factions. If a faction only has three members 
in it for more then a month the faction should be cancelled and 
they should join a strong one until they have enough support.
